text: David Humanes Muñoz (born 13 November 1996), commonly known as David Bollo, is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Armenian club Ararat-Armenia. ==Career== ===Club=== On 5 August 2020, Armenian champions Ararat-Armenia announced the signing of Bollo. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Arahal Balompié |2016–17 |rowspan="2"|Second Andalusian Seville Gr.1 |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||3||0 |- |2017–18 |8||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||8||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !11!!1!!0!!0!!-!!-!!-!!-!!11!!1 |- |CD Alcalá |2018–19 |Tercera División Group 7 |13||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||1 |- |rowspan="3"|Slavia Sofia |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Parva liga |11||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||11||0 |- |2019–20 |4||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||5||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !15!!0!!1!!0!!-!!-!!-!!-!!16!!0 |- |Academica Clinceni |2019–20 |Liga I |11||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||11||0 |- |Ararat-Armenia |2020–21 |Armenian Premier League |1||0||0||0||1||0||1||0||3||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !51!!2!!1!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0!!54!!2 |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players Category:FC Ararat-Armenia players Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria
